summary:
Now you can use every campfire like the Campfire Camping System mod.
This mod don't change the basic idiom of Campfire Master Mod
descriptionHtml:
Now you can use every campfire like the Campfire Camping mod.
This mod don't change the basic idiom of Campfire Master Mod.
I will implement this mod into MyVisionOfSkyrim Mod, in fact, this mod is a little part of that work.
Endorse if you like it

I am searching someone for collaboration for another mod
-someone who can modify or create nif file
-someone for english translation (from bad english to good english)
-someone for dds file
-someone for extracting and packing bsa file
author: Luca Zanne
